item.title: Stripping Down for a Night at a French Museum

item.title: Spain’s new ‘Big Brother’ travel rules are driving tourists to explore other holiday destinations
item.description: The goal is to boost security and the "fight against terrorism and organised crime". Failure to comply could result in fines of up to 30,000 euros.
